issue.title: [Java] Override ValueVector toString() method
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6452](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6452). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently cpp code `Array#ToString` returns the human readable format string like:

[

  1,

  2,

  3

]

But Java `ValueVector` did not implement like this way now.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6452?focusedCommentId=16951633) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5271
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5271>
